title: RB救命帖 （材质）
author: RB大魔王
txt_content:
RB救命帖 （材质）珍藏版  受害者：RB
问题：
在Minecraft.jar什么东西是要保留做材质的呀？
答对有奖！大家还在等什么？（这不是开玩笑的...）

replies.author: 专业坑爹三十年
replies.txt_content: 瓦语死早，听不懂乃在说什么{:10_535:}

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Texture_Packs


File        Description        Notes
pack.png        Thumbnail of pack in texture selection list.        Size should be 128x128 pixels.
pack.txt        Optional description of texture in pack selection list.        Any text after the first 33 characters will not appear.
particles.png        All Particles        The redstone particles' color cannot be changed.
terrain.png        All blocks        Since Beta 1.8, the chest has its own texture located in item/chest.png, (and item/largechest.png) similar to that of mobs.
The water and lava textures can only be changed with the HD Texture pack patch. Not used after snapshot 13w02a and version 1.5.
/achievement        The achievements screen GUI.        
/armor        All armor in game.        
/art        All paintings in game.        
/environment        Snow, rain and clouds.        
/font        In-game font.        
/gui        Item hotbar, inventory screens, Minecraft logo and menu background.        /gui/items.png is no longer used after snapshot 13w02a/1.5 .
/item        In-game models for items such as signs, carts, boats, arrows, and Chests.        The doors file is not used.
/misc        Biome grass/foliage color, overlay for pumpkin helmets, the clock dial, footprint, explosion particles, the End's sky color, and the map background. (Plus a few things you should leave be.)        tunnel.png is tiled on each face of the End's skybox in a 16x16 grid.
/mob        All mobs in game.        
/terrain        Sun and moon.        The image is horizontally flipped in the game. (any words drawn will be backwards until sunset, and then they will be forwards)
/textures/blocks        What used to be in terrain.png.        Only used in 13w02a/1.5 or later.
/textures/items        Everything that used to be in gui/items.png.        Only used in 13w02a/1.5 or later.
/title        panorama pics, mclogo, black.png, mojang, and splashes.        
/title/bg        Minecraft main menu background        Named panorama0 - panorama5
